knimeNode.name: Molecule to RDKit
knimeNode.shortDescription: Generates RDKit molecules from a string representation (SDF or Smiles).

fullDescription.intro: Generates RDKit molecule column from a string representation (SDF or Smiles) and appends it to the table.
fullDescription.option: The column that contains the molecules (SDF or Smiles type column).
Name of the new column in the output table.
Toggles removal of the input molecule column in the output table.

If the molecule in an input row cannot be converted, you can select if this row should be separated from the output table and be delivered at the second port, or if a missing value should be inserted instead of the RDKit molecule in the result table.

Select this option to generate 2D coordinates for the molecules. The coordinates are used, e.g. in the 2D rendering of the structure (if not selected, the renderer will (re-)compute coordinates on demand).
Select this box to enforce 2D coordinate generation. Coordinates may already be available in the (SDF) input, so this option allows you to discard the original coordinates and recompute from scratch.

ports.inPort: Data with Smiles or SDF representation of molecules
ports.outPort: Rows that could not be converted to a RDKit molecule
